properties.entry:
Insert into scholarshipdetail
(File_No, Amount, State_Id, Remark, Approved, Created_Date, Is_Reoccurring, Is_Conditional, Parent_Income) values
(:File_No, :Amount, :State_Id, :Remark, :Approved, :Created_Date, :Is_Reoccurring, :Is_Conditional, :Parent_Income)
on duplicate key update
File_No=:File_No, Amount=:Amount, State_Id=:State_Id, Remark=:Remark, Approved=:Approved, Created_Date=:Created_Date, Is_Reoccurring=:Is_Reoccurring, Is_Conditional=:Is_Conditional, Parent_Income=:Parent_Income
